meanings.definition: A type of primate native to Madagascar.
meanings.sent1: The lemuroids in the zoo were very playful.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study lemuroids to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The lemuroids decided to have a dance party in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The lemuroids moved through the trees like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful lemuroids swinging from branch to branch.

meanings.definition: Plural form of lemuroid, referring to multiple species of lemurs.
meanings.sent1: We saw a family of lemuroids at the nature reserve.
meanings.sent2: The lemuroids in the exhibit were quite diverse in size and color.
meanings.sent3: The lemuroids gathered for a group photo, but some blinked at the wrong time.
meanings.sent4: The lemuroids scattered like confetti when they heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent5: The guide pointed out the different types of lemuroids living in the forest.
